helpList.name: _help
helpList.description: shows a list of the commands and what they do

helpList.name: _rank
helpList.description: check your current xp and tokens

helpList.name: _shop
helpList.description: shows a list of items in the token shop

helpList.name: _purchase
helpList.description: purchase an item from the token shop

helpList.name: _gift
helpList.description: gift another user tokens (will draw from your token count)

helpList.name: _leaderboard
helpList.description: show a leaderboard of the top levels on the server
